definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The focal point of the construction lies at the W?hringerstrasse, where the main entrance, accessible through an inviting hall, is located.
sentences.chinese: 大樓結構的焦點位於由大廳可到達的主入口所在地。

sentences.english: Zhongguanchun is home to China's hi-tech industry and more than ten famous universities.
sentences.chinese: 中關村是中國高技術產業和十多所著名大學的所在地。

sentences.english: The second place we visited was Monaco Ville with the palace.
sentences.chinese: 我們參觀的第二個地方是王宮的所在地摩納哥維爾。

sentences.english: The site of the condominium is enclosed with stakes.
sentences.chinese: 公寓所在地的四周用木椿圍了起來。

sentences.english: At the same time, it shall report to the administrative department at the provincial level where it is located.
sentences.chinese: 同時，抄報其所在地省級工商行政管理部門。

sentences.english: It was also the seat of the Chinese viceroy of the three Manchurian provinces.
sentences.chinese: 這也是東北三個省所在地的中國總督的。

sentences.english: From Xichang, we drove three hours to Zhaojue, the area's county seat.
sentences.chinese: 我們的車開了3個小時到達昭覺縣所在地。

sentences.english: It is situated from Beiyu commune about 38 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 格薩爾達拉距白玉鄉府所在地38公里。

sentences.english: Shiyan is an emerging auto industry city, the seat of China's Second steam.
sentences.chinese: 十堰是一座新興的汽車工業城市，爲中國二汽所在地。

sentences.english: The situs test also applies in relation to tangible movable property.
sentences.chinese: 財產所在地規則同樣適用於有形動產。

sentences.english: Spring town has a long history, outstanding people, is the seat of the ancient Yue state capital.
sentences.chinese: 泉水鎮歷史悠久，人傑地靈，是古越州府所在地。

sentences.english: It is also home to the Lanxiang Vocational School, which was founded with military support.
sentences.chinese: 同樣是藍翔職業技術學校所在地。

sentences.english: Weifang is the hometown of kites as well as the headquarter of World Kite Federation.
sentences.chinese: 濰坊是風箏的故鄉，是世界風箏聯合會總部所在地。

sentences.english: The establishment of adjudicatory apparatus and administrative offices of the maritime courts shall be decided by the Supreme People's Court.
sentences.chinese: 海事法院對所在地的市人民代表大會常務委員會負責。

sentences.english: Graphic logo with the company's coat of Stuttgart where city emblem.
sentences.chinese: 圖形車標採用公司所在地斯圖加特市的盾形市徽。

sentences.english: For Wanjiazhai Yellow River Water Control Project and the location of the project leader.
sentences.chinese: 爲萬家寨水利樞紐工程和引黃工程龍頭所在地。

definition: place/location/(after a noun) place where it is located
located at/set up in a particular location
one's affiliation (i.e. the organization one is affiliated with)/subordinate (i.e. those subordinate to oneself)/belonging to/affiliated/under one's command
capital city of an autonomous region
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
to be situated/to be located (of a building)
within the borders/internal (to a country, province, city etc)/domestic
